title: What to know about Israel’s controversial ‘buffer zone’ in Gaza
description: The United States has been vocally opposed to the creation of a buffer zone in Gaza, saying there should be no permanent change to Palestinian territory.

title: Doomsday Clock at 90 seconds to midnight amid nuclear and AI threats
description: The Bulletin of the Atomic Scientists’s dire prediction of threats to humanity comes during the Russia-Ukraine and Israel-Gaza wars, and as the use of AI rises.

title: 245,000 Jewish Holocaust survivors are alive today. Where are they now?
description: The Claims Conference, in a demographic report, said many survivors who were children during the Holocaust are now in need of home and health care.

title: Russian military jet crashed near Belgorod, killing 74, officials say
description: Russian officials accused Ukraine of shooting down the plane and said Ukrainian prisoners of war were on board but did not provide evidence of either claim.

title: Scientific breakthrough may save northern white rhino through surrogacy
description: Scientists made history by successfully transferring a rhinoceros embryo for the first time.

title: Israel, Hamas still distant on hostage deal as U.S. envoy heads to region
description: A top U.S. official is expected to discuss Hamas-held hostages in Egypt and Qatar, but progress may be slow, National Security Council spokesman John Kirby said.

title: Israel-Gaza war live updates: Intense fighting traps thousands in Khan Younis hospital, relief group says
description: Gazans at Nasser Hospital could not follow an Israeli directive to evacuate, Doctors Without Borders said. Israel says it has encircled the city.

title: Israel turns to Indian workers as Gaza war worsens labor shortage
description: Israel is recruiting tens of thousands of Indian migrant workers at a time when Palestinian laborers are being barred from the country.

title: Israeli hostage families have ‘nothing left to lose’ in push for new deal
description: Families of Israelis still held hostage by Hamas in Gaza have stepped up their pressure campaign, hoping to push the government to negotiate a new release deal.

title: Blinken tours West Africa amid looming shadow of China and Russia
description: As the Biden administration grapples with conflicts in the Middle East and Ukraine, it’s also trying to show it remains committed to its partnerships in West Africa.

title: What’s BDS, the movement to boycott Israel with a new social media following?
description: Since the Gaza war started, influencers have forgone Starbucks and McDonald’s to rally behind Palestinians, dovetailing with the older Boycott, Divestment, Sanctions movement.
